titles: A modest enquiry, whether St. Peter were ever at Rome, and bishop of that church? wherein, I. the arguments of Cardinall Bellarmine and others, for the affirmative are considered, II. some considerations taken notice of that render the negative highly probable.
author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.
notes: Attributed to Henry Care.  Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo, --  Saint, 1542-1621. --  De notis ecclesiae.
